This will most likely happen after the VRC. We can collect ideas here. 

* consider creating just one graph for latency, with annotations describing that the latency occurs between different machine pairs
* consider laying the machines out as a tree diagram with the Router at the top (participant 5 suggestion)
* shrink the headers down by repositioning some of the information from the headers
* change color scheme
* consider grouping the Tasks with the simulator machine since they are most closely related OR move tasks to the top (needs more discussion)
